algorithm_technique: Prefix sum calculation on a boolean array indicating vowel start/end
problem_summary_simple: Count strings in given ranges that start and end with a vowel.
problem_summary_technical: Precompute prefix sums of strings starting and ending with vowels to answer range queries in O(1) time.
key_insights: The problem can be efficiently solved by transforming it into range sum queries.
A prefix sum array allows for O(1) calculation of sums over any subarray.
Identifying strings that start and end with vowels is a simple check on the first and last characters.
